reuters.title: DU PONT <DD> UNIT TO REDEEM NOTES
reuters.body: Du Pont Overseas Capital N.V., a unit of Du Pont Co, said it will redeem on May 15 all 189 mln dlrs of its outstanding 13-3/4 pct guaranteed retractable notes due 1997. It will buy back the notes at par value plus accrued interest, Du Pont Overseas said. Reuter 
